data.title: Medical Consultation Website Modernization
data.description: Redesign of the medical consultation website using Angular.
data.details: I worked on the restructuring and modernization of the medical consultation website at Gal√°xia Digital, migrating from pure JavaScript to Angular. The transformation included improvements in interface, usability, and performance, resulting in a more modern and functional design.

data.title: Website Development for Mattress Company
data.description: Development of a website for a mattress company using Angular.
data.details: I was responsible for creating and optimizing the website for a mattress company using Angular to replace the pure JavaScript code. The project resulted in a more sophisticated design, improved user experience, faster navigation, and a more modern look.

data.title: Queue Reduction and Sales Increase
data.description: Implementation of improvements in the payment system.
data.details: I worked on optimizing the payment flow at Grupo Panvel, enabling transactions directly at the counter. This change drastically reduced queues and positively impacted sales.

data.title: Bug Fixing and Quality Assurance
data.description: Identification and fixing of issues before delivery.
data.details: I performed continuous testing and problem anticipation at Grupo Panvel, ensuring the delivery of a more stable and secure code, minimizing failures in production.

data.title: User Experience Improvement
data.details: At Grupo Panvel, I worked on optimizing interfaces to make new system workflows more intuitive and efficient. I improved the payment process and adapted the interface to ease adoption by users, ensuring a smoother and more accessible experience.
